entry.title: Tokyo motor touring list
entry.content:

  2. okutama: best place for riding in the mountain, have many parking space to rest.
  3. 城南島海浜公園: free parking space and places to sit
  4. 金田さざなみ公園: free parking space available

entry.title: 写在2022年11月
entry.content:
学校停电在家无事可做，回顾一下即将过去的一年吧。毕竟12月预计挺忙的。

这一年，放弃继续读博深造，决定了在日本就职并找到了一份互联网工作。
这一年，开始了一项新爱好：二轮。从四月最初的Honda CBR250R到10月的大型二轮YAMAHA MT-09SP。由最初只是想试试新事物到逐渐着迷，深入研究引擎和机械结构，对器械工业有了一定理解。除此之外，试骑了KAWASAKI NINJA H2，HONDA CBR1000RR-R FIREBLADE这两辆顶级跑车。
这一年，实现了经济独立，虽然还是学生，但通过便利店，学校，公司的打工获得了足够支撑个人生活开销，学杂费开销的收入。虽然一周工作超过30小时还要兼顾研究是很累的事，但感觉空下来就会胡思乱想，起码能充实的度过每一天也不差。
这一年，认真的锻炼身体，虽然感觉体质还是和原来一样，不过肉眼可见的练出了形状，洗澡的时候总被大叔盯着看。。。（那句话咋说来着）
这一年，终于贯通了从后端到前端的整个WEB开发流程。从零写了http服务器和几个基于React的UI。接触了Node.js。
这一年，写出了基于OpenGL和Dear imgui的3D渲染系统。终于参透了OpenGL的流水线模型的设计思想。
这一年，读完了APUE，没什么大的收获，开始肯Unix Socket。
这一年，开始了对于DBMS的研究，在团队的帮助下接触了Oracle。开始了CMU的Bustub，希望从它的开发中加深理解。
这一年，依然是孤身一人。和去年不同的是，没有交到新朋友，因为几乎所有的时间都在工作和研究。因为价值观和做事原则的问题和几个朋友决裂。从不解到愤怒到绝望到接受，用了将近半年时间。没有得到身边任何人的帮助，还是走过来了。我常常想假如最初显得合群一点，亲和一点，会不会也会有很多每天可以出去happy的朋友，也会找到可以交心的伴侣？

这一年下来是好是坏呢？也许还是在原地踏步。

entry.title: When you need a warm hug
entry.content:
That one person who maintains eye contact while everyone else is interrupting you. That one person you can communicate with just through a look. Feeling connected with another human being on that level is an amazing feeling. My mom would always bring sliced fruits to me when I live at home, and whenever I visit home she still does. You might think you will never feel the same feelings for someone else. You will, and that's going to be so much better. You are capable of loving and of being loved deeply over and over again.

Now let's take a deep breath until the screen turns black all of us together...

Hey, pick this word, that you are never going to settle for a life that you don't even like. Okay? So I created a Pinterest board for you of photos of things that I find to be comforting and calming and I hope you like it.

The fact that none of us expect to find cookies when we find an old cokie jar. Grief is just love with no place to go. Jamie Anderson wrote that. Did you know about it that has made it that squirrels accidentally plant millions of trees worldwide each year because they forget where they put their nuts and seeds. Squirrels are unintentionally saving forests and I don't think we give him credit. There is someone who when they think of their fondness memories you are in it, and you will never know. Your parents leaving the bedroom door cracked open when you were a kid to make you feel safe. The moment you realize that you have been sitting quietly with someone and it's been comfortable. It's rare but it's a beautiful thing when it happens. Wearing headphones when there is nothing playing. It makes me feel that I am wearing an invisibly cloak. It doesn't matter that it could have been or that others have it worse. Your feelings are valid. Don't let anyone tell you otherwise. The fact that saying, oh, Big Stretch! Every time our dog stretches is a universal thing. Laying in someone's arms as they play with your hair. Watching whatever you're baking expand in the oven... Trees covered in snow and a quiet forest. Pretty much everything that Carl Sagan has ever written like when he described what a book is writing: "... one glance at it and you're inside and the mind of another person, maybe somebody dead for thousands of years. Across the millennia, an author is speaking clearly and silently inside your head, directly to you. Writing is perhaps the greatest of human inventions, binding together people who never knew each other, citizens of distant epochs."

Morning stuffs. Morning cuddles, morning coffee, morning texts, morning walks,... On times when I've laid awake at night, unable to sleep. Perhaps feeling uneasy, I have found comfort in knowing that somewhere in the world, it's morning or daytime. Someone is getting ready for their day. Another is have lunch. The sun is always shining somewhere. Just keep swimming, just keep swimming. I first saw Nemo when I was 9 or 10 and to this day I find myself repeating those words of Dory whenever I need them. Nothing happens to anyman which is not formed by nature to Bear. Marcus Aurelius wrote that. The street light coming on when it get dark outside. Libraries, Ikea, Bob Ross making tea in a kettle on a gas just seeing humans. Human like seeing someone accidentally tripping over something on the street or failing over wouldn't sleep away outside. Someone trying to suit their crying baby. Someone carrying too many grocery bags or spilling something on themselves. It's all, just, authentic. The word 'mellifluous', which means a sound that is pleasingly smooth and musical to hear. You didn't deserve what was done to you and I'm sorry you have to go through that. Forehead kisses, trust me on this one, not everything needs be to questioned some. Something will never be understood. Let it be, sometimes it's the only way of setting yourself free.

There's something comforting about knowing that when it rains, everyone in the city or whatever you live notices and everyone who was outside gets wet. Rain is never personal. "tu me manques": French for "I miss you" --- literal translating is you are missing from me. I think that's beautiful. Your dog is always excited to see you. You are their whole world. It might get worse before it gets better. But it does get better. This is not as goog as it gets. It's Okay to just lay in bed when you're having a difficult day. You don't need to try and turn it around. Just know that tomorrow is a new day and you will never have to do this day again. Everything will be okay.

Lana Blakely

entry.title: MT-09SP 2022 纳车！
entry.content:
从预定到纳车没想到就等了一个月。
这次是全新的888cc YAMAHA MT-09sp！直列三缸引擎CP3，搭载九轴陀螺仪，TCS，Quickshifter和巡航系统。大概是目前性价比最高的大型二轮了。哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦！
新车要慣らし運転1000km。这1000km不能跑超5000rpm，以及要用输出最低的Mode 4。简单的讲就是磨合期。不仅是引擎，轮胎和刹车也要磨合。因为新胎比较硬，所以更容易打滑。。。刹车片也是新的，非常滑，刚开始刹车就非常不好用。不过因为本身就全都是新的，刚开始走行就会闻到各种焦味，耐热胶啊，排气管啊，引擎上的部件之类的。接下来的一个月要各处旅行了！

entry.title: How to integrate imgui to OpenGL application rendering pipeline
entry.content:
The idea of Dear imgui :

It outputs optimized vertex buffers that you can render anytime in your 3D-pipeline enabled application

Which has meaned that adding these optmized vertex buffers at any time in the rendering pipeline is possible.

Also the CMakeFileLists of standalone imgui library is used to integrate this UI to any program!

entry.title: A way to connect XOS to Windows samba server
entry.content:
I have been using the file sharing system for one year, but using the Windows machine provided by school. It is not a good choice to use this PC to work then browse files on Windows and find some ways to transport files from that machine to my Mac. Thus, I spent some time on connecting the two different file systems.
Actually, it it the original idea that the network was designed to share files between different systems. It is just the complicacy of this system that made connections difficult. There is really a solution provided by Finder on Mac. Using the Connect to server option in the Go panel, then input the server name and share name in the form of "smb://server_name/share_name". The connection is ready if the above information is correct.
ref: http://kb.mit.edu/confluence/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=3908137

entry.title: Abashi
entry.content:
这次去了名叫Abashi的印度餐厅。
主菜是馕和咖喱，单从菜单看就发现其实只有咖喱和馕，加上烤鸡腿。

首先要选择一个套餐，这套餐搭配很简单，馕和咖喱，馕有多种可选，根据加的佐料，有芝士之类的。然而这价格对于我来说有点高，于是就点了普通的馕。咖喱的选择有一个专门的菜单。有各种佐料，第一次来，就选了比较大众的鸡肉咖喱。然后选辣度，从0到100可选。根据菜单的建议，到5就是一般辣咖喱的味道了，作为在家做过辣咖喱的人，我决定选择5。实际上完全不辣，或者说基本感觉不到辣。后来和前辈聊起，一般都选20。更有甚者选择100，毕竟那是极限辣度，就总有人选择挑战一把，我就算了。。。

回到菜单，选择一个套餐之后，就可以去乘免费的汤喝了。有鸡蛋汤和番茄汤可选。

因为鸡蛋汤太一般，于是只拍了番茄汤。味道真的不错。

然后是烤鸡腿，点了一个大蒜的，烤的还是可以的，但是蒜味其实不太浓，总体印象一般吧。

重点还是馕和咖喱。

好大一片馕，然后撕下来一片，沾上右边的咖喱，就是所有的吃法。真的太好吃了。就和家里的馒头蘸酱一样。然而咖喱是热的，馕也是刚烤出来的，实在是太棒了。

以后还会再来，考虑到是饭店，所以一顿990吃下来其实价格可以接受。
